channel.title: Music on Fran Copelli

item.title: 0Frena
item.description: 2019 - Present Genre: Dream rock Bandcamp Frenamusic.com

item.title: 1withinwaters
item.description: 2018 - Present Genre: Experimental pop Members: Zack Lauzon, Fran Copelli (vocals and lyrics) withinwaters (EP, 2018)

item.title: 3Akage No Anne
item.description: 2016 - 2018 Genre: Experimental Poprock Members: Yoshihide Nakajima, Tom Dunbar, Fran Copelli (synthesizers and vocals) Good Cake (EP, 2018) Cornelia (Single, 2017) Noise (Single, 2017)

item.title: 4ATTALOOM
item.description: 2011 - 2014 Genre: Witch house Members: Fran Copelli Bring Me, Too (LP, 2013) Anonymity (Single, 2014) Memory Garden (Single, 2013) Lady of My Dreams (Soundtrack, 2012) Dream World (LP, 2012) WYAMWIA, TIWISY (EP, 2011)

item.title: 5Tokko Bandito
item.description: 2009 - 2011 Genre: Instrumental Members: Patrick Conry, Zack Lauzon, Fran Copelli (keyboard) AIN (LP, 2010) AINSOPH (LP, 2010)

item.title: 6Francie Copelli
item.description: 2009 - 2011 Genre: minimalist Members: Fran Copelli The Grotto Chamber (LP, 2011) Nostalgia (LP, 2010) Fragments (LP, 2009)
